<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grasping Limbs](/Feats.aspx?ID=2929) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon grabs enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184) trait. It gains the [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) action on that unarmed attack.
name: Grasping Limbs

<summary>
Your eidolon grabs enemies.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Grasping Limbs Source Secrets of Magic pg. 71 1.1 --- Your eidolon grabs enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the grapple trait. It gains the Grab action on that unarmed attack.
